stateDiagram

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

state Deal {

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as Deal.(InitialState)

        DealFirst

        DealFirst : DealFirst

        DealFirst : enter / #123; _adapter.DealFirstCard()#59; #125;

        DealMid

        DealMid : DealMid

        DealMid : enter / #123; _adapter.DealMidCard()#59; #125;

        DealLast

        DealLast : DealLast

        DealLast : enter / #123; _adapter.DealLastCard()#59; #125;

        SelectTrump

        SelectTrump : SelectTrump

        SelectTrump : enter / #123; _adapter.SelectTrump()#59; #125;

}

state Play {

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as Play.(InitialState)

        PlayFirst

        PlayFirst : PlayFirst

        PlayFirst : enter / #123; _adapter.PlayFirstCard()#59; #125;

        PlayMid

        PlayMid : PlayMid

        PlayMid : enter / #123; _adapter.PlayMidCard()#59; #125;

        PlayLast

        PlayLast : PlayLast

        PlayLast : enter / #123; _adapter.PlayLastCard()#59; #125;

        state Meld {

                %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
                %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
                state "." as Meld.(InitialState)

                TryMelded

                TryMelded : TryMelded

                TryMelded : enter / #123; _adapter.TryMeld()#59; #125;

                Melded

                Melded : Melded

                Melded : enter / #123; _adapter.MeldSuccess()#59; #125;

                NoMeld

                NoMeld : NoMeld

                NoMeld : enter / #123; _adapter.MeldFailed()#59; #125;

                AddPoint

                AddPoint : AddPoint

                AddPoint : enter / #123; _adapter.AddMeldPoints()#59; #125;

                NewTrick

                NewTrick : NewTrick

                NewTrick : enter / #123; _adapter.StartNewTrick()#59; #125;

        }

}

AddOneCardToAll

AddOneCardToAll : AddOneCardToAll

AddOneCardToAll : enter / #123; _adapter.DealCardsToAll()#59; #125;

GameOver

GameOver : GameOver

GameOver : enter / #123; _adapter.GameOver()#59; #125;

state L9Play {

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as L9Play.(InitialState)

        L9PlayFirst

        L9PlayFirst : L9PlayFirst

        L9PlayFirst : enter / #123; _adapter.L9PlayFirstCard()#59; #125;

        L9PlayMid

        L9PlayMid : L9PlayMid

        L9PlayMid : enter / #123; _adapter.L9PlayMidCard()#59; #125;

        L9PlayLast

        L9PlayLast : L9PlayLast

        L9PlayLast : enter / #123; _adapter.L9PlayLastCard()#59; #125;

        L9NewTrick

        L9NewTrick : L9NewTrick

        L9NewTrick : enter / #123; _adapter.StartL9NewTrick()#59; #125;

}

RoundEnd

RoundEnd : RoundEnd

RoundEnd : enter / #123; _adapter.EndRound()#59; #125;

CalculatePoint

CalculatePoint : CalculatePoint

CalculatePoint : enter / #123; _adapter.CalculatePoints()#59; #125;

ROOT.(InitialState) --> Deal

Deal.(InitialState) --> DealFirst

DealFirst --> DealMid : Complete

DealMid --> DealLast : Complete

DealLast --> SelectTrump : Complete

SelectTrump --> Play : Complete

Play.(InitialState) --> PlayFirst

PlayFirst --> PlayMid : HasMid

PlayFirst --> PlayLast : Complete

PlayMid --> PlayLast : Complete

PlayLast --> Meld : Complete

Meld.(InitialState) --> TryMelded

TryMelded --> Melded : Success

TryMelded --> NoMeld : Failed

Melded --> AddPoint : Complete

NoMeld --> NewTrick : Complete

AddPoint --> NewTrick : Complete

NewTrick --> AddOneCardToAll : Complete

NewTrick --> GameOver : WinningScore

AddOneCardToAll --> Play : Complete

AddOneCardToAll --> L9Play : DeckEmpty

L9Play.(InitialState) --> L9PlayFirst

L9PlayFirst --> L9PlayMid : HasMid

L9PlayFirst --> L9PlayLast : Complete

L9PlayMid --> L9PlayLast : Complete

L9PlayLast --> L9NewTrick : Complete

L9NewTrick --> L9Play : Complete

L9NewTrick --> RoundEnd : NoCard

L9NewTrick --> GameOver : WinningScore

RoundEnd --> CalculatePoint : Complete

CalculatePoint --> Deal : Complete

CalculatePoint --> GameOver : WinningScore
Events
settings
